headline.main: Rob Lowe Likes His Miramax Investment

abstract: Following various reports that he had met with Tom Barrack of Colony Capital -- and was perhaps pursuing a big media deal with the private equity firm -- the actor Rob Lowe has confirmed that he is one of the investors in the recent acquisition of Miramax Films.
